Video quality is surprisingly good for the size, but still noticeably inferior to larger rips.

Audio, however, is terrible. That's what happens when you encode at 64kbps. The audio quality made this unwatchable for me.

I really think if you bumped up the audio bitrate to 128kbps you could have a nifty little package here that would still weigh in under 700MB. Consider it for next time, and thank you for the effort.
